Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Can I cancel anytime? A: Yes, cancel anytime with no questions asked. Keep access until the end of your billing period.

Q: Do you offer refunds? A: Yes, 7-day money-back guarantee on all plans. Lifetime members get 30 days.

Q: How are alerts delivered? A: Via email, SMS, Discord, and Telegram. You choose your preferred methods.

Q: Is this financial advice? A: No, we provide education and analysis. Always do your own research.

Q: How many spots are available? A: Premium membership is limited to maintain quality. Currently 237/500 spots filled.
